scripts.install:all: concurrently -n "main,appA,appB" -c "gray.bgBlue,white.bgMagenta,white.bgGreen" "cd container-app && npm i" "cd app-a && npm i" "cd app-b && npm i"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "main,appA,appB" -c "gray.bgBlue,white.bgMagenta,white.bgGreen" "npm run start-main" "npm run start-a" "npm run start-b"
